org.agreement_technologies.service.map_communication

Class AgentCommunicationImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_communication.AgentCommunicationImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AgentCommunication

    public class AgentCommunicationImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements AgentCommunication
    AgentCommunicationImp class implements the interface AgentCommunication to provide methods for the agents to communicate among them through sockets.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AgentCommunicationImp.CommunicationException
      CommunicationException class defines an exception that occurs during communication.
